name: SYNtAX
description:
SYNtAX

A game produced at APU by Dawson Mix.

Contact: dmix18@apu.edu

Description

Syntax is a story-based RPG about a group of children and their adventure through their town to stop mysterious evil creatures. The game contains 30- to 45-minutes of gameplay.

Controls

Z/X/Enter (Start); arrow keys (Movement)
